original_text: The Pharisees left the meeting place immediately. They went to meet with some other people who were friends with the ruler, Herod. The Pharisees talked with them about how they could kill Jesus.
korean_text: 바리새인들이 나가서 곧 헤롯당과 함께 어떻게 하여 예수를 죽일까 의논하니라

sentences.original_text: The Pharisees left the meeting place immediately
They went to meet with some other people
who were friends with the ruler, Herod
about how they could kill Jesus
sentences.korean_translation: 어떻게 예수를 죽일 수 있을지에 대해
